name: emfluenceEcommerceMarketingFacts
0:
”Alexa, open E. commerce Marketing Facts.”
”tell me a marketing fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: e. commerce marketing facts
des: Get access to the latest metrics, best practices, and campaign advice for your next ecommerce digital marketing campaign from the emfluence Ecommerce Marketing Facts Skill. Ask Alexa to “tell me an ecommerce marketing fact” to learn two helpful digital marketing facts that can power your ecommerce marketing campaigns or benchmark your ecommerce marketing efforts. When using the skill, you can say, “Alexa, next” to move to the next fact.
